snippet: The Canadian yoga wear maker said incomplete testing protocols were to blame for its see-through pants problem.
abstract: Canadian yoga wear maker Lululemon says chief product officer Sheree Waterson is stepping down, as it updates production problems it has had with see-through pants.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian yoga wear maker said incomplete testing protocols were to blame for its see-through pants problem.

headline.seo: Lululemon Chief Product Officer to Exit
headline.main: Lululemon’s Top Product Officer to Leave After Pants Fiasco
headline.print_headline: Lululemon’s Top Product Officer to Leave After Pants Fiasco
